data.title: Bilderbibel.: Mit Hundert Lithographien von Felix Hoffmann by The holy Scriptures and the Bible, Paul Erismann: Good Hardcover (1961) 1st Edition.
data.meta_description: 1st Edition. - Hardcover - Zwingli-Verlag - 1961 - Condition: Good - No Jacket - Bilderbibel (Picture Bible) 1961. 4Â°. 3 Bl., 100 S. mit Abbildungen nach Lithographien von F. Hoffmann, 2 Bl. Altes Testament + Neues Testament. Text all in Swiss German by Erismann.Felix Hoffmann (born 18 April 1911 in Aarau; died 16 June 1975) was a Swiss graphic designer, illustrator and stained glass artist. He created countless illustrations for children's books, illustrations from literature (including the only one of Thomas Mann authorized illustration of The Magic Mountain), and stained glass windows, frescoes, and Etchings. 100 pp. - Bilderbibel.: Mit Hundert Lithographien von Felix Hoffmann
data.text:
Shipping Terms:

Same day shipping whenever possible.

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 1-2 lbs.

If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.

Please let us know up front if you want to insure your purchase so we might request that added amount.

We may also LOWER shipping, if ordering a pamphlet, paperback, or lightweight book.
